Mayor Pro Tem
-------------

Mayor Pro Tem Andrew Clark
![Andrew Clark](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_18411943/Image/Government/City%20Council/Mayor's%20Office/Mayor%20Pro%20Tem/637648153143930000.jpeg "Andrew Clark")
Elected May 2019; Appointed June 2018
